devdoc.author: rube
devdoc.details: Inherits from Ownable for access control

params._owner: The address that will be set as the owner of the contract

params.token: The address of the ERC20Permit token to be used
params.tokenConfig: The configuration for the new token
params.tokenOwner: The address that will own the new token

returns._0: IERC20Permit The address of the newly created AllowlistDraggableShares token

setManager(address).details: Can only be called by the contract owner

params._manager: The address of the new factory manager

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Allowlist draggable factory

FactoryManagerUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the factory manager is updated

userdoc.notice: This contract is responsible for creating new AllowlistDraggableShares tokens
